front.title: Computing-aware Traffic Steering for attack detection

abstract.t: This document describes the closed-loop framework for computing-aware traffic steering for attack detection (CATS-AD). The computing-aware traffic steering is determined by composing selected service instances and overlay links. The service instances are selected according to the computing power of service instances. This document describes the closed-loop framework for attacks detection and how to select and combine service instances to form a computing-aware service function chain (SFC).
